name: Olan Byrne
body:
### Hi.
I'm a software engineer living in Belfast, NI. I've experience with everything from C to JavaScript, although it is mostly JS based projects that get submitted to github (@olanb7). If you want to find out more, [linkedin](http://uk.linkedin.com/in/olanbyrne/) is probably best.

I'm also cycle, for both practical and impractical reasons. Check out what I've been doing on [strava](http://app.strava.com/athletes/158856), and tell me to step away from the computer and train via [twitter](http://twitter.com/olanb7).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
